content.title: Electronic Music Events - FED
content.text: Front-end React.js project that allows users to search for an event by location or name, as well as posting, editing and/or deleting events.

content.title: Electronic Music Events - BED
content.text: Back-end Node.js project. It manages the database to post, edit and delete events.
content.tools: Node.js, Express.js, Prisma - MySQL, Planet Scale DB, Sentry...

about.AboutMe: Hi, I am Full-stack Web Developer who was driven by the ambition to transition into a new career path to cultivate both my creative and analytical capabilities.  With a strong focus on efficiency and an innate attention to detail, I posses a natural aptitude for understanding the intricacies of design and code structure.  Committed to continual growth to make a lasting impact on user experience.
